name: Pal InfoCom Technologies Inc
tag_list: software-development-company, usa, india, software, java, php, -net, testing, software-testing
overview:
Pal InfoCom Techologies, is a technology focused company ventured by industry experienced IT and management professionals envisioned to provide web, wireless & SMS enabled applications development & maintenance services thru our offshore development facility based at Mohali (India). For the better management of projects, we have consultants based in California and Portland (OR) in USA. We are also incorporated in US to better protect interests of our esteemed clients.

The value proposition that we offer is to be your cost & quality effective software development services partner. PalInfoComâ€™s expertise lies in building systems ground-up that cater to long-term goals of clients in wide variety of industry verticals. We have been servicing various small & mid sized global clients since early 2005. Currently, a 30 in-house web development professionals team, we have made it a habit to deliver quality to our esteemed clients.

You may like to take a virtual tour of our facility at http://palinfocom.net/facility_tour.php
